title: Full-Stack Web Developer
description: Acme Inc. is seeking a skilled full-stack web developer to help us build and maintain our web applications. You will be responsible for developing both the front-end and back-end of our web applications, as well as integrating with third-party APIs.
responsibility: Develop and maintain web applications using modern front-end frameworks (e.g. React, Vue) and back-end frameworks (e.g. Ruby on Rails, Django), integrate with third-party APIs, collaborate with designers and other developers.
education: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field.
experience: Minimum 3 years of experience in full-stack web development.

title: Front-End Web Developer
description: We're looking for a front-end web developer to help us build and maintain our web applications. You will be responsible for developing the front-end of our web applications using modern frameworks and technologies.
responsibility: Develop and maintain the front-end of our web applications using modern front-end frameworks (e.g. React, Vue), collaborate with back-end developers and designers.
education: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field.
experience: Minimum 2 years of experience in front-end web development.

title: Back-End Web Developer
description: ABC Industries is seeking a skilled back-end web developer to help us build and maintain our web applications. You will be responsible for developing the back-end of our web applications using modern frameworks and technologies.
responsibility: Develop and maintain the back-end of our web applications using modern back-end frameworks (e.g. Ruby on Rails, Django), collaborate with front-end developers and designers.
education: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field.
experience: Minimum 3 years of experience in back-end web development.

title: Web Application Developer
description: 123 Web Design is looking for a talented web application developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications for our clients.
responsibility: Develop and maintain web applications using modern front-end and back-end frameworks, collaborate with designers and other developers, ensure the performance and scalability of web applications.
education: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field preferred.
experience: Minimum 2 years of experience in web development.

title: WordPress Developer
description: Green Tree Marketing is seeking a skilled WordPress developer to help us build and maintain our clients' websites. You will be responsible for developing custom WordPress themes and plugins.
responsibility: Develop custom WordPress themes and plugins, collaborate with designers and other developers, ensure the performance and scalability of WordPress websites.
education: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field preferred.
experience: Minimum 3 years of experience in WordPress development.

title: Senior Web Developer
description: Blue Sky Technologies is seeking a highly skilled senior web developer to lead the development of our web applications. You will be responsible for mentoring junior developers and ensuring the quality of our codebase.
responsibility: Lead the development of our web applications, mentor junior developers, ensure the quality and scalability of our codebase, collaborate with designers and other developers.
education: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field preferred.
experience: Minimum 5 years of experience in web development, with at least 2 years in a leadership role.
